content.question:
Figure 1 shows a cell membrane that is composed of a phospholipid bilayer and several other components.

Figure 1. Components of a cell membrane

Based on Figure 1, which of the following membrane components are most likely nonpolar?

choices.label: The phospholipid heads and the channel protein
The phospholipid heads and the glycoprotein
The phospholipid tails and the embedded protein

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
